formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'SetGlobalVar' =-
[Synopsis] Set a global variable to a given value
[Description] SetGlobalVar(variable=value): This application sets a given global variable to the specified value.
This application is deprecated in favor of Set(GLOBAL(var)=value)

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.2 +++ in Asterisk 1.4 @@ -6,3 +6,6 @@ [Description] SetGlobalVar(variable=value): This application sets a given global variable to the specified value. + + + This application is deprecated in favor of Set(GLOBAL(var)=value)
